page.title: 19GAMES
page.content: THE RIBBON GAME started when a girl in our school brought in her gymnastic ribbon. Ribbons are used to make interseting shapes in the air. HIGH TIG is often played in this area. There are two catchers, and every one else has to run and find a high place to stand or sit, while the catchers count up to 100. The players' feet must not touch the ground. If the catcher touches someone with their feet on the ground, that person is out and must stand still until someone else touches them to release them. The game continues until the catchers have caught everyone.
